text: Tum say yeh to kabhi na ho sakay ga kay apni tamam biwiyon mein her tarah adal kero go tum iss ki kitni hi khuwaish-o-kosish ker lo iss liye bilkul hi aik ki taraf maeel ho ker doosri ko udhar latakti hui na choro aur agar tum islaah kero aur taqwa ikhtiyar kero to be-shak Allah Taalaa bari maghfirat aur rehmat wala hai
